name: Metal and Hauling RPG Simulator
description:
Hauling with building and running trucks plus hauling dirt, lumber and building houses from blueprints that you want to build for your house to rent or to sell. but look out something might happen to that house and you might have to build it again after you clean in it up! You can mine ores out of mines then sell it, you can do jobs by cleaning up junk and haul or sell it. Or grind it and haul it in the dump truck. Haul logs and skid them. Will be adding way more things to do over time.
Will add cutting trees later but not in game. You can haul other trucks and things around.
